TextLibrary.Text: Erik's father, Lord Michael, must be around here somewhere.
You have failed to defeat the Orc. You will need to try again if you are to rescue Lord Michael.
You have defeated the Orc and rescued Lord Michael.
Return Lord Michael to his son
Erik the Squire is overjoyed to see his father alive and well. He gives you his favorite bow.
You must go to the Ogre's Tower and search for Lord Michael.
You must now return to Bartonia and reunite Michael with his son Erik.
This Orc is bigger and stronger than most. He can stun you with his massive club.
